text: Ghar-e-Pariyan is a cave near Isfahan. It is situated at an altitude of 2967 m above sea level. Its entrance measures approximately 1.6 x 1.2 meters. Its coordinates are "". ==See also== *Geography of Iran *List of caves in Iran ==References== Category:Archaeological sites in Iran Category:Caves of Iran Category:Landforms of Isfahan Province Category:Tourist attractions in Isfahan Province
title: Ghar-e-Pariyan
